channel.title: /w Synonyms - Listed
channel.description:
Lmao, I see a lot of people in game making mistakes when whispering, then the msg is now out in the open and that ruins that, lol. They just type the wrong thing. instead of /w theyll type something else. As it stands you can only do one command to whisper (/w ____ (their number))
Here's some ideas for synonyms:
/whisper ____ (their number) /whisper ____ (their name) /w ____ (their name) /pm ___ (their name/number) /dm ___ (their name/number) /tell ____ (their name/number)
lol well you get the point, my suggestion in this thread is basically synonyms for /w to prevent accidental miswhispers. :P

item.title: /w Synonyms - Listed
item.dc:creator: Simon
item.description:
In my opinion:
All of them should be able to be used with name or number
And add /msg, it’s just what I and some others prefer to use

Read full topic

item.title: /w Synonyms - Listed
item.dc:creator: Strangle
item.description:
I agree with you i think we need this for tos players who only use names to whisper as.

Read full topic

item.description:
Lmao, I see a lot of people in game making mistakes when whispering, then the msg is now out in the open and that ruins that, lol. They just type the wrong thing. instead of /w theyll type something else. As it stands you can only do one command to whisper (/w ____ (their number))
